original_text:
Dragons Clusterbuster
La tana del drago
Lo sviluppatore Red Tiger ci ha da sempre abituato a giochi molto divertenti e con una grafica impeccabile. Dobbiamo dire che anche con Dragons Clusterbuster le nostre speranze non sono state disattese. Come intuibile dal titolo, la slot ha come tema i draghi, maestose creature mitologiche dotate di ali e capaci di sputare fuoco dalla bocca.
I colori principali del gioco sono l’oro, l’argento e il rame, ma anche il blu e il verde seppur in tono minore. Ai lati della griglia c’è la pelle squamosa del drago, per il momento unico riferimento al tema del gioco.
In alto ci sono tre tondi con un lucchetto disegnato al centro della griglia si trova un uovo, che svolgerà una delle funzioni principali del gioco.
Meccanismo a grappolo
In questa slot la meccanica di gioco a grappolo: ogni volta che atterra un cluster di almeno cinque simboli identici adiacenti si ottiene una combinazione vincente. Il sistema è a cascata, quindi i simboli vincenti scompaiono e vengono rimpiazzati da simboli del tutto nuovi che possono generare nuove combo paganti. A ogni giro atterrano quindi 72 simboli. La griglia di gioco ha forma quadrata, con nove rulli e nove righe. La scommessa minima è di 0,20 €, ma si può alzare a piacimento. Tra le funzioni principali c’è l’Autoplay e il Turbo, che permette di accelerare la caduta dei simboli.
La volatilità è alta, per cui non si vince spesso ma i premi sono sostanziosi.
L’occhio del drago
Oltre alle carte da gioco, che sono i simboli che pagano meno, troviamo la pergamena, le spade, la sfera con la croce e la corona. Il simbolo Wild sostituisce tutti i simboli e può comparire in ogni posizione della griglia.
Al centro della griglia è presente un quadrato 3×3 con all’interno un uovo. Ogni qualvolta con un unico Spin vengono rimossi i simboli intorno all’uovo, i contorni si illuminano. Rimuovendo tutti gli otto simboli, nell’uovo apparirà un occhio e verrà sbloccata la funziona corrispondente. La prima è l’occhio azzurro. In questo caso i simboli di basso valore vengono rimossi, generando un effetto a cascata che può produrre vincite più alte.
Rimuovendo le successive otto tessere al centro, si sblocca la seconda funzione. L’occhio del drago è ora verde e in modo casuale vedremo numerosi Wild sostituire diversi simboli base.
La terza funzione è legata all’occhio viola. In questo caso dei fulmini colpiranno un numero casuale di simboli trasformandoli in moltiplicatori.
L’ultima funzione è quella dei Free Spins. Sbloccando otto tessere intorno all’uovo riceveremo in omaggio dieci giri gratuiti.






Domande Frequenti 
Cosa vuol dire sistema a cascata?

Significa che ogni volta che otteniamo una combinazione vincente, i simboli paganti vengono rimossi e sostituiti da altri nuovo, che possono generare ulteriori combo.



A quanto corrisponde il ritorno teorico al giocatore di Dragons Clusterbuster?

Il valore RTP è del 96%, nella media della maggior parte dei giochi di slot!



Posso giocare a Dragons Clusterbuster anche sullo smartphone?

Certo, Dragons Clusterbuster è disponibile per ogni device!

raw_translation.response:
Dragons Clusterbuster
The Dragon's Lair
Red Tiger, the developer, has always provided us with highly entertaining games boasting impeccable graphics. Dragons Clusterbuster is no exception. As the title suggests, the slot game revolves around majestic mythological creatures, the Dragons, with wings and the ability to breathe fire.
The game's main colors are gold, silver, and copper, with blue and green in a minor tone. At the sides of the reel, there's the Dragon's scaly skin, which is the game's only reference to the theme.
At the top, there are three rounds with a lock in the center of the reel, and in the middle, there's an egg that will play one of the primary functions in the game.
Cluster Mechanism
The game mechanic in this slot is a cluster mechanism; every time a cluster of at least five adjacent identical symbols lands, it results in a winning combination. The system is cascading, so the winning symbols disappear and are replaced by new symbols that can generate new payouts. Therefore, every spin has 72 symbols landing. The game grid is square, with nine reels and nine rows. The minimum bet is 0.20€, but it may be increased at will. The primary functions are Autoplay and Turbo, which accelerate the fall of the symbols.
The game has a high volatility, so you don't win often, but the payouts are substantial.
The Dragon's Eye
Other than the playing cards, the symbols that pay out the least, there are scrolls, swords, cross spheres, and crowns. The Wild symbol can replace all other symbols and can land in any position on the reel.
In the middle of the reel, there is a 3x3 square with an egg inside. Every time the symbols around the egg are removed with a single spin, the edges light up. By removing all eight symbols around the egg, an eye will appear in the egg, and you'll unlock the corresponding function. The first is the blue eye. In this case, low-value symbols are removed, generating a cascading effect that can produce larger payouts.
Removing the next eight tiles in the middle unlocks the second function. The Dragon's Eye is now green, randomly displaying numerous Wilds that replace different base symbols.
The third function is related to the purple eye. In this case, lightning bolts will strike a random number of symbols, transforming them into multipliers.
The final function is the Free Spins. By unlocking eight tiles around the egg, you'll receive ten free spins as a gift.



Frequently Asked Questions
What does cascade system mean?

It means that every time you obtain a winning combination, the payout symbols will be removed and replaced by new ones, generating further combos.


What's the theoretical return to player (RTP) of Dragons Clusterbuster?

The RTP is 96%, which is the average for most slot games!


Can I play Dragons Clusterbuster on my smartphone?

Certainly, Dragons Clusterbuster is available on any device!
raw_translation.role: You are an experienced translator from any language to English.

raw_translation.response:
"Dragons Clusterbuster" Review

"The Dragon's Den"

Red Tiger, the developer, has always provided us with highly entertaining games with impeccable graphics. It is safe to say that Dragons Clusterbuster does not disappoint. As the title suggests, the theme of the slot game is dragons - mythical creatures with wings and the ability to breathe fire.
The main colors of the game are gold, silver, and copper, along with green and blue. The dragon's scaly skin is visible on the sides of the grid, which is the only reference to the game's theme.
Three round shapes with a lock on the top, and an egg is located in the center, which plays a significant function in the game.
Cluster Mechanism
In this slot game, the cluster mechanism is used: whenever a cluster of at least five identical adjacent symbols lands, a winning combination is obtained. The system works by cascading; thus, winning symbols disappear, and they are replaced by completely new ones that can generate new winning combinations. Subsequently, 72 symbols land on each turn. The game grid is square in shape, with nine reels and nine rows. The minimum bet is €0.20, but it can be increased at any time. The Autoplay and Turbo are among the essential functions, allowing the players to speed up the falling of symbols.
The volatility is high, so you may not win often, but the rewards are substantial.
The Dragon's Eye
Apart from the playing cards, which are the symbols that pay the least, we also find the scroll, swords, the sphere with the cross, and the crown. The Wild symbol replaces all symbols and can appear anywhere on the grid.
In the center of the grid, there is a 3×3 square with an egg inside. Whenever the symbols around the egg are removed in a single spin, the outlines light up. By removing all eight symbols, an eye appears in the egg, and the corresponding function is unlocked. The first one is the blue eye. In this case, the low-value symbols are removed, generating a cascading effect that can produce higher winnings.
Removing the next eight tiles in the center unlocks the second function. The Dragon's Eye is now green, and we will randomly see numerous Wilds replacing various base symbols.
The third function is linked to the purple eye. In this case, lightning will strike a random number of symbols, transforming them into multipliers.
The last function is Free Spins. By unlocking eight tiles around the egg, ten free spins will be awarded.

FAQs
What does the cascading system mean?
It means that whenever we get a winning combination, the paying symbols are removed, and they are replaced by other new ones that can generate further combos.

What is the theoretical return to player of Dragons Clusterbuster?
The RTP value is 96%, which is the average for most slot games!

Can I play Dragons Clusterbuster on my smartphone?
Of course! Dragons Clusterbuster is available for every device!

response.headline: Gameplay Mechanics
response.content: Dragons Clusterbuster uses a cluster mechanism to generate winning combinations. The game grid is 9x9, and at least five identical adjacent symbols generate a cluster. The system works by cascading; thus, winning combinations disappear, and the cascading effect can lead to new wins. The game features Autoplay and Turbo functions to speed up gameplay. The game has high volatility, so wins may not be frequent, but when they occur, they are substantial.

response.headline: Visual Design
response.content: The game's theme is centered around dragons, with the main colors being gold, silver, and copper, green, and blue. Aside from the dragon's scaly skin visible on the game grid's sides, there is no direct reference to the game's theme. The game's graphics are highly detailed, as we would expect from a Red Tiger slot game.

response.headline: Special Features
response.content: Dragons Clusterbuster has a central 3x3 square on the game grid, where eggs with corresponding eyes are located. Each eye has a unique function that can be unlocked by removing the surrounding symbols around the egg. The blue eye removes low-value symbols, creating a cascading effect that can generate higher wins. The green eye randomly replaces different base symbols with Wilds. The purple eye randomly strikes a number of symbols with lightning, turning them into multipliers. The last function is Free Spins, where eight tiles around the egg are removed, and ten free spins are awarded.

response.headline: Volatility
response.content: Dragons Clusterbuster has high volatility, meaning wins may not happen often, but when they do, they are substantial. The game's RTP value is 96%, which is the average for most slot games.

response.headline: Compatibility
response.content: Dragons Clusterbuster is compatible with every device, including smartphones, desktops, and tablets.

Review: "Dragons Clusterbuster" Review

"The Dragon's Den"

Red Tiger, the developer, has always provided us with highly entertaining games with impeccable graphics. It is safe to say that Dragons Clusterbuster does not disappoint. As the title suggests, the theme of the slot game is dragons - mythical creatures with wings and the ability to breathe fire.
The main colors of the game are gold, silver, and copper, along with green and blue. The dragon's scaly skin is visible on the sides of the grid, which is the only reference to the game's theme.
Three round shapes with a lock on the top, and an egg is located in the center, which plays a significant function in the game.
Cluster Mechanism
In this slot game, the cluster mechanism is used: whenever a cluster of at least five identical adjacent symbols lands, a winning combination is obtained. The system works by cascading; thus, winning symbols disappear, and they are replaced by completely new ones that can generate new winning combinations. Subsequently, 72 symbols land on each turn. The game grid is square in shape, with nine reels and nine rows. The minimum bet is €0.20, but it can be increased at any time. The Autoplay and Turbo are among the essential functions, allowing the players to speed up the falling of symbols.
The volatility is high, so you may not win often, but the rewards are substantial.
The Dragon's Eye
Apart from the playing cards, which are the symbols that pay the least, we also find the scroll, swords, the sphere with the cross, and the crown. The Wild symbol replaces all symbols and can appear anywhere on the grid.
In the center of the grid, there is a 3×3 square with an egg inside. Whenever the symbols around the egg are removed in a single spin, the outlines light up. By removing all eight symbols, an eye appears in the egg, and the corresponding function is unlocked. The first one is the blue eye. In this case, the low-value symbols are removed, generating a cascading effect that can produce higher winnings.
Removing the next eight tiles in the center unlocks the second function. The Dragon's Eye is now green, and we will randomly see numerous Wilds replacing various base symbols.
The third function is linked to the purple eye. In this case, lightning will strike a random number of symbols, transforming them into multipliers.
The last function is Free Spins. By unlocking eight tiles around the egg, ten free spins will be awarded.

FAQs
What does the cascading system mean?
It means that whenever we get a winning combination, the paying symbols are removed, and they are replaced by other new ones that can generate further combos.

What is the theoretical return to player of Dragons Clusterbuster?
The RTP value is 96%, which is the average for most slot games!

Can I play Dragons Clusterbuster on my smartphone?
Of course! Dragons Clusterbuster is available for every device!

response.headline: Exploring the Gameplay Mechanics
response.content:
Are you ready to take on the Dragons in the latest game sensation - Dragons Clusterbuster? The game boasts of using a unique cluster mechanism to generate winning combinations and is set on a 9x9 grid. The winning combination consists of at least five identical adjacent symbols that generate a cluster. Look at it as a siblings reunion; the more, the merrier!

As you spin the reels, you'll notice the unique cascading effect the cluster system creates. Winning combinations disappear, and the cascading effect can lead to unlimited new wins! It's almost like being in an endless buffet, where the food keeps replenishing, and all you need to do is enjoy.

Dragons Clusterbuster does not disappoint with its Autoplay and Turbo functions which makes the gameplay speed up. With high volatility, your winning chances might not always be frequent, but believe us when we say, when they occur, they are out of this world! It's like finding a dollar bill in a jacket you haven't worn in years - rare and thrilling. So, put on your fireproof suit, prepare for battle, and have a blast with Dragons Clusterbuster!

response.headline: Exploring the Exciting Special Features of Dragons Clusterbuster!
response.content:
Let's talk about the special features of Dragons Clusterbuster, as this online slot game is not your average run-of-the-mill casino game. In the central 3x3 square on the gaming grid, there are brightly-colored eggs each with a particular function assigned to them. But be warned, not all eggs were created equal! So, make sure to keep your eyes peeled for the egg with the blue eye, the green eye, the purple eye, and finally, the one that unleashes Free Spins.

If your luck is on your side, you'll spot the blue-eyed egg, which can magically remove low-value symbols that are holding your slot wins back. Say goodbye to those pesky low-value symbols that are 'egg-sactly' what keep you from hitting that big win! Want a fun pun? Well, you can count on me, cracking those all night long!

Now, let's move on to the green-eyed egg. Not everyone's heard of it, but trust me, you'll want to keep it under your watchful eyes. This egg can randomly replace base symbols with Wilds, increasing the chance of getting bigger and better payouts. One minute you may be spinning alone, and the next, your success is hatching before your eyes.

The purple-eyed egg might look a little menacing, with its electric power, but it's just there to offer players higher chances of hitting multipliers. When the purple lightning strikes a symbol, it automatically converts it into a winning multiplier. It's a little bit like being struck by lightning, but thankfully there's no actual electricity involved. Just unimaginable surprise and pleasure!

And finally, last but certainly not least, the egg that awards Free Spins. This incredible egg unleashes 10 exciting free spins when the eight symbols around it are removed. If you love free stuff, then you're in for a treat, because who says no to free spins? They're one of the best parts of slot games and are a real egg-citing feature.

Are you ready to face the fiery roar of the dragons? Well, be warned that with Dragons Clusterbuster, you're in for a wild ride!

This game has a high volatility level that can make even the bravest of players shy away! Don't be discouraged though, as this means that when you do win, you'll land yourself a tremendous payout that can make you feel like you've found a treasure trove.

The game's RTP value of 96% stays true to the average rate of most slot games. Which, by the way, is just a fancy way of saying that the game is fair to play. So, in essence, you have a chance to make it big without feeling like you've just donated to a dragon's den! That being said, don't go flying too close to the sun hoping to snatch the dragon's hoard. For those of you who prefer a more relaxed game with lower volatility, perhaps a unicorn-themed game would be more suited to your liking. You hear they're pretty chill!

response.headline: Get Fired Up with the Gameplay Mechanics
response.content:
Calling all dragon slayers! Are you looking for a sizzling, new slot game that will set your world on fire? Look no further than Dragons Clusterbuster! This game takes a unique approach to the classic slot game format by using a cluster mechanism.

Instead of lining up symbols in a traditional payline, you must match a cluster of at least five symbols to win. And when you do win, hold on to your hats! The cascading feature ignites, and winning symbols disappear, making way for new symbols, creating even better chances to hit the jackpot!

The game grid is laid out in a fiery square with nine red-hot reels and nine rows. What's more, there are a whopping 72 symbols available on each turn, meaning the chance to match your way to the big bucks is hotter than ever! With the minimum bet of just €0.20, anyone can jump into the action and take on the dragons.

If you're a thrill-seeker looking for even more of a rush, you can always bump up the bet at any time. But beware, you may be playing with fire! Want to take your gameplay to the next level? The Autoplay and Turbo features are also available. So get ready to ignite your inner dragon and soar to new heights with Dragons Clusterbuster!

response.headline: Visuals and Aesthetics
response.content:
Are you ready for a color explosion? The Dragons Clusterbuster game will take you on a very colorful and visually stimulating ride! The combination of gold, silver, and copper mixed with blue and green creates a unique and eye-catching color palette that draws players in.

Despite its name, Dragons Clusterbuster doesn't exactly showcase the dragons front and center. They only make brief appearances on the sides of the slot grid. Instead, players can expect to see traditional playing card symbols, like diamonds, spades, and hearts, which pay out the least. However, other more intriguing and higher-paying symbols, such as scrolls, swords, and a sphere with a crown, are sure to keep players entertained and hopeful for big wins.

And don't forget about the mysterious egg in the center of the 3x3 square! As adjacent symbols are removed, the egg lights up to unlock one of four exciting functions. Who knows what mysterious surprises lie within?

Overall, Dragons Clusterbuster provides gamers with a visual treat that will keep them glued to the screen for hours on end, even if the dragons do not show up as much as we would like. Plus, that egg in the center? It may just hatch into a fortune!

response.headline: Bonus Features
response.content:
Get ready for some egg-citing bonus features in Dragons Clusterbuster! And we're not just yolking around.

The Wild symbol is always a welcome sight, but the central 3x3 square is where the real magic happens. With an egg waiting to be uncovered, the game unlocks four different bonus functions when you surround it with removed tiles. The first one is called the blue eye, and it removes all low-value symbols, making way for higher payouts. Nice.

The second function is the green eye, and it's just as envy-inducing as its color suggests. This bonus sees tons of Wilds appearing on the reels, replacing all sorts of base symbols at random. It's like the Easter Bunny came early and decided to scatter some eggs around!

But, wait, there's more! With the purple eye, random symbols get zapped by lightning and turn into multipliers. Don't worry; no dragons were harmed in the making of these electrifying bonuses.

And finally, for the grand finale, the fourth bonus unlocks ten free spins when you remove all eight tiles around the egg. It's like the game is giving you a golden egg of your own – minus the goose and the beanstalk.

Review:
 
Gameplay Mechanics

Dragons Clusterbuster uses a cluster mechanism to generate winning combinations. The game grid is 9x9, and at least five identical adjacent symbols generate a cluster. The system works by cascading; thus, winning combinations disappear, and the cascading effect can lead to new wins. The game features Autoplay and Turbo functions to speed up gameplay. The game has high volatility, so wins may not be frequent, but when they occur, they are substantial.

Visual Design

The game's theme is centered around dragons, with the main colors being gold, silver, and copper, green, and blue. Aside from the dragon's scaly skin visible on the game grid's sides, there is no direct reference to the game's theme. The game's graphics are highly detailed, as we would expect from a Red Tiger slot game.

Special Features

Dragons Clusterbuster has a central 3x3 square on the game grid, where eggs with corresponding eyes are located. Each eye has a unique function that can be unlocked by removing the surrounding symbols around the egg. The blue eye removes low-value symbols, creating a cascading effect that can generate higher wins. The green eye randomly replaces different base symbols with Wilds. The purple eye randomly strikes a number of symbols with lightning, turning them into multipliers. The last function is Free Spins, where eight tiles around the egg are removed, and ten free spins are awarded.

Volatility

Dragons Clusterbuster has high volatility, meaning wins may not happen often, but when they do, they are substantial. The game's RTP value is 96%, which is the average for most slot games.

Compatibility

Dragons Clusterbuster is compatible with every device, including smartphones, desktops, and tablets.

Dragons Clusterbuster uses the cluster mechanism where a cluster of at least five identical adjacent symbols is needed to obtain a winning combination. The system uses cascading, meaning that winning symbols disappear, and new ones come in to generate new winning combinations. The game grid is square in shape, with nine reels and nine rows, and there are 72 symbols available on each turn. The minimum bet possible is €0.20, but this can be increased at any time. The Autoplay and Turbo features are also available, allowing for faster gameplay.

Visuals and Aesthetics

Dragons Clusterbuster has impressive graphics with colors like gold, silver, and copper mixed with blue and green. Although the game is about dragons, their appearance is only visible on the sides of the grid. The playing card symbols are the ones that pay the least, while others like the scroll, swords, and sphere with the crown pay more. The grid also includes a 3x3 square with an egg in the center, which lights up when adjacent symbols are removed to unlock one of four functions.

Bonus Features

Apart from the Wild symbol that replaces all other symbols, the game's central 3x3 square has an egg that unlocks four bonus functions when surrounded by removed tiles. The first, called the blue eye, removes low-value symbols, producing higher winnings. The second function, the green eye, sees numerous Wilds appearing to replace various base symbols at random. The third function, the purple eye, sees random symbols being hit by lightning to transform into multipliers. The fourth unlocks ten free spins when the eight tiles around the egg are all removed.

Volatility

The game's volatility is high, so players may not win every time, but the rewards are significant.

Compatibility

Dragons Clusterbuster is accessible on all devices, including smartphones.

faq.answer: The theoretical return to player of Dragons Clusterbuster is 96%, which is the average for most slot games.

faq.answer: Yes, Dragons Clusterbuster is available for every device!

faq.answer: The Wild symbol replaces all symbols and can appear anywhere on the grid.

Review: "Dragons Clusterbuster" Review

"The Dragon's Den"

Red Tiger, the developer, has always provided us with highly entertaining games with impeccable graphics. It is safe to say that Dragons Clusterbuster does not disappoint. As the title suggests, the theme of the slot game is dragons - mythical creatures with wings and the ability to breathe fire.
The main colors of the game are gold, silver, and copper, along with green and blue. The dragon's scaly skin is visible on the sides of the grid, which is the only reference to the game's theme.
Three round shapes with a lock on the top, and an egg is located in the center, which plays a significant function in the game.
Cluster Mechanism
In this slot game, the cluster mechanism is used: whenever a cluster of at least five identical adjacent symbols lands, a winning combination is obtained. The system works by cascading; thus, winning symbols disappear, and they are replaced by completely new ones that can generate new winning combinations. Subsequently, 72 symbols land on each turn. The game grid is square in shape, with nine reels and nine rows. The minimum bet is €0.20, but it can be increased at any time. The Autoplay and Turbo are among the essential functions, allowing the players to speed up the falling of symbols.
The volatility is high, so you may not win often, but the rewards are substantial.
The Dragon's Eye
Apart from the playing cards, which are the symbols that pay the least, we also find the scroll, swords, the sphere with the cross, and the crown. The Wild symbol replaces all symbols and can appear anywhere on the grid.
In the center of the grid, there is a 3×3 square with an egg inside. Whenever the symbols around the egg are removed in a single spin, the outlines light up. By removing all eight symbols, an eye appears in the egg, and the corresponding function is unlocked. The first one is the blue eye. In this case, the low-value symbols are removed, generating a cascading effect that can produce higher winnings.
Removing the next eight tiles in the center unlocks the second function. The Dragon's Eye is now green, and we will randomly see numerous Wilds replacing various base symbols.
The third function is linked to the purple eye. In this case, lightning will strike a random number of symbols, transforming them into multipliers.
The last function is Free Spins. By unlocking eight tiles around the egg, ten free spins will be awarded.

FAQs
What does the cascading system mean?
It means that whenever we get a winning combination, the paying symbols are removed, and they are replaced by other new ones that can generate further combos.

What is the theoretical return to player of Dragons Clusterbuster?
The RTP value is 96%, which is the average for most slot games!

Can I play Dragons Clusterbuster on my smartphone?
Of course! Dragons Clusterbuster is available for every device!
